title: [German newsreel]
brief_description: Cinemagazine newsreel items including: International trade show; Axel Springer (publishing company) new headquarters situated close to the Berlin Wall; Gutenberg Museum; detailed look at modern and traditional printing techniques; Helmut A.P. Greishaber, GErmany’s leading woodcarver, at home relaxing and working; Munich’s Leopold Strasse - artist/student district; five days of leading gymnasts from 41 countries compete for World championships at Dortmunder.
